entry.message: [info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmpzxgriytk\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0139.9858] The percentage of the Tier 1 capital to be adequately capitalized of 0.085 is greater than the percentage of Tier One capital to be well capitalized with a value of 0.08.
It looks like the tier 1 capital includes a buffer. If a buffer is used the extension element TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyWithBufferToRiskWeightedAssets should be used rather than the element TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets.
The properties of this us-gaap:TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : srt:ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis=srt:SubsidiariesMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:9858 Rule version: 19.0.0RC5 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1118004/000111800422000015/banc-20211231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0139.9858] The percentage of the Tier 1 capital to be adequately capitalized of 0.085 is greater than the percentage of Tier One capital to be well capitalized with a value of 0.08.
It looks like the tier 1 capital includes a buffer. If a buffer is used the extension element TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyWithBufferToRiskWeightedAssets should be used rather than the element TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets.
The properties of this us-gaap:TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacyToRiskWeightedAssets fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : srt:ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis=srt:SubsidiariesMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:9858 Rule version: 19.0.0RC5 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1118004/000111800422000015/banc-20211231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
